reuters.title: JAMESWAY CORP SETS 2-FOR-1 STOCK SPLIT, UPS CASH PAYOUT 33 PCT
reuters.body: Microtel Inc said it has completed the acquisition of <American Teledata Corp> and its US Dial subsidiary, which provide long distance telephone service in northeast Florida. Terms were not disclosed. Microtel's shareholders include Norfolk Southern Corp <NSC>, M/A-Com Inc <MAI>, Centel Corp <CNT>, Alltel Corp <AT> and E.F. Hutton Group Inc <EFH>. Reuter 
